name: Toxicity (E. server)
description:
The goal of this game is to fix pipes before too much gas leaks.

We had fun making this game. This project feels a lot more polished compared to our previous one.

Pretty much non stop work went into this game over the last 3 days, so we hope you will enjoy this game as much as we enjoyed making it.
Controls: 
      1. "E" to pick up wrenches and power cells.
      2. "Left Click" to use the wrenches and power cells.
      3. "W, A, S, D" and "L-Shift" to move and sprint.
      4. "Esc" to open pause menu.
Warning:
      The sound might be a little loud. (Didn't have time to add a volume setting.)

Thank you for checking out this project! :)
 - The "E. server" development team.
